snippet: Five months after the United Nations General Assembly voted to upgrade Palestine’s status to a nonmember observer state, Google has followed suit.
abstract: Google follows suit five months after United Nations General Assembly voted to upgrade Palestine's status to a nonmember observer state, labeling its local home page 'Palestine' instead of 'Palestinian territories'.
lead_paragraph: Five months after the United Nations General Assembly voted to upgrade Palestine’s status to a nonmember observer state, Google has followed suit.
